com.smartthings.sdk.smartapp.core.extensions.contextstore

Interface DefaultInstalledAppContextStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InstalledAppContextStore<DefaultInstalledAppContext>, RequestPreprocessor

    public interface DefaultInstalledAppContextStore
extends InstalledAppContextStore<DefaultInstalledAppContext>, RequestPreprocessor
    The default implementation of InstalledAppContextStore which stores instances of DefaultInstalledAppContext as an instance of a RequestPreprocessor, allowing hook-up into SmartApp lifecycle events with minimal effort.
